name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Result-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in **backend development**, specializing in **cloud services** and **microservices** architecture. Proven expertise in **API design** and **database management**, creating high-performing APIs and scalable services. Proficient in **scripting languages** such as Python (**FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**) and adept with **version control systems**. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to solve complex challenges, contributing to significant projects for industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

• Implemented event-driven architectures leveraging **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of over **10,000** financial transaction requests per month.
• Deployed microservices using **Azure App Services** while managing infrastructure with **Terraform**, contributing to a **20%** reduction in deployment time.
• Established and maintained data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for regulatory data exchange, ensuring data accuracy with a latency of less than **5 minutes**.
• Conducted comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime for authentication systems.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges and maintain compliance with an **80%** success rate on first release cycles.

• Developed robust **backend systems** using **Python 3.x** and **FastAPI 0.65.0** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven **microservices** with **Celery 5.0** and **Redis 6.0**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, leading to a **40% reduction in processing time**.
• Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform 1.0** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments.
• Engineered efficient data pipelines for secure exchange of regulatory data using **Apache Airflow 2.0** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow, achieving a **99% uptime**.
• Performed comprehensive security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, while integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and securing access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, facilitating smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management using **Git 2.30** for version control.

• Spearheaded **backend development** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking utilizing **Python**, **Flask** and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations, achieving a 25% increase in operational efficiency.

• Collaborated closely with frontend teams on **API design**, delivering data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring seamless user interactions and reducing latency by 15%.
• Ensured platform compliance with regulatory requirements such as **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, adhering to internal data security protocols, achieving full audit readiness on all fronts.
• Designed and implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, enhancing QA and CI processes, thereby reducing bug count by 40% during development cycles.
• Introduced **job queuing** and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution, resulting in a 50% improvement in process management efficiency.
• Maintained version control using **Git**, fostering team collaboration and ensuring effective code reviews across a team of 9 developers.
